rules:
    response-body-status-code-oas2:
        description: All success responses except 202 & 204 should define a response body.
        severity: warn
        formats:
            :
        given: $.paths[*][*].responses[?(@property >= 200 && @property < 300 && @property != '202' && @property != '204')]
        then:
            field: schema
            function: truthy
